title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: Edinburgh to Beattock by Caledonian Eailway, and from thence by coach to Dumfries, page 399.

title: Letters and memorials of Jane Welsh Carlyle.
author: Carlyle, Jane Welsh
snippet: And my letter must be in the Post-Office before one o'clock! ' Very absurd! ' ' And I have had to go to Beattock in the omnibus  with my cousin Helen to see her off for Glasgow, and am so tired ! Don't wonder then if you get a ' John's letter ' ■ from me also.
